ComicInfo.Title: Family Ties, Part 2
ComicInfo.Summary: All sides are directed to one place. Sonatine influences Ian to help him.
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-06-23 22:33:50. [CVDB118660]
ComicInfo.Penciller: Brian Ching, Clarence Lansang, Joe Benitez, Marc Silvestri
ComicInfo.Inker: Marc Silvestri, Matt Banning, Richard Bennett, Victor Llamas
ComicInfo.Colorist: Jonathan D. Smith, Matt Nelson, Richard Isanove
ComicInfo.Editor: David Wohl, Marc Silvestri, Sonia Im
ComicInfo.Characters: Bruce Wilder, Frankie Franchetti, Ian Nottingham, Jackie Estacado, Jake McCarthy, Joe Siry, Sara Pezzini, Sonatine, Tora No Shi, Witchblade
ComicInfo.Teams: Darklings, New York Police Department, The Franchetti Family, Yakuza
ComicInfo.Locations: New York City, New York State, Queens
